secret_rule: Pairs of items can be brought to the picnic if they are both the same color.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "apple" and "cherry" and "fire truck" and "rose".
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring a "strawberry" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring a "tomato" to the game?

Based on the examples and the guesses, it seems the rule might be that you can only bring items that are red or are commonly associated with the color red. All examples and successful guesses—"apple," "cherry," "fire truck," "rose," "strawberry," and "tomato"—are associated with the color red. Therefore, my best guess is that the secret rule involves items that are or are associated with the color red.
